name: Multi-Environment Tomcat Deployment

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main   # change if needed

jobs:
    
  build:
    name: Build Java App
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout Code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Setup JDK 17
        uses: actions/setup-java@v3
        with:
          java-version: '17'
          distribution: 'temurin'

      - name: Build with Maven
        run: mvn clean package -DskipTests

      - name: Upload Artifact
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: webapp
          path: target/*.war

  deploy-dev:
    name: Deploy to DEV
    needs: build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment: dev

    steps:
      - name: Download Artifact
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: webapp

      - name: Deploy WAR to Tomcat (DEV)
        run: |
          curl -v -u ${{ secrets.TOMCAT_DEV_USER }}:${{ secrets.TOMCAT_DEV_PASS }} \
          --upload-file *.war \
          "http://${{ secrets.TOMCAT_DEV_SERVER }}:8080/manager/text/deploy?path=/kp&update=true"

  deploy-test:
    name: Deploy to TEST
    needs: deploy-dev
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment:
      name: test
      url: https://test.yourapp.com
    steps:
      - name: Download Artifact
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: webapp

      - name: Deploy WAR to Tomcat (TEST)
        run: |
          curl -v -u ${{ secrets.TOMCAT_TEST_USER }}:${{ secrets.TOMCAT_TEST_PASS }} \
          --upload-file *.war \
          "http://${{ secrets.TOMCAT_TEST_SERVER }}:8080/manager/text/deploy?path=/kp&update=true"

  deploy-preprod:
    name: Deploy to PREPROD
    needs: deploy-test
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment:
      name: preprod
    steps:
      - name: Download Artifact
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: webapp

      - name: Deploy WAR to Tomcat (PREPROD)
        run: |
          curl -v -u ${{ secrets.TOMCAT_PREPROD_USER }}:${{ secrets.TOMCAT_PREPROD_PASS }} \
          --upload-file *.war \
          "http://${{ secrets.TOMCAT_PREPROD_SERVER }}:8080/manager/text/deploy?path=/kp&update=true"

  deploy-prod:
    name: Deploy to PROD
    needs: deploy-preprod
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment:
      name: prod
      url: https://yourapp.com

    steps:
      - name: Download Artifact
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: webapp

      - name: Deploy WAR to Tomcat (PROD)
        run: |
          curl -v -u ${{ secrets.TOMCAT_PROD_USER }}:${{ secrets.TOMCAT_PROD_PASS }} \
          --upload-file *.war \
          "http://${{ secrets.TOMCAT_PROD_SERVER }}:8080/manager/text/deploy?path=/kp&update=true"
